DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effect THR-4109 weight loss obese subject 24-week treatment period .
DOC.criteria: 30 60 year age Body mass index 30 40 kg/m2 Women child bear potential negative pregnancy test prior entry agree use acceptable method contraception throughout study Able willing give write informed consent Weight loss 3 kg previous 3 month Current previous use ( within 3 month ) medication influence weight Known endocrine origin obesity , hypothyroidism Cushing 's syndrome Current history eat disorder bulimia , anorexia nervosa , binge eat laxative abuse Current serious/unstable medical condition Current pharmacologically treat diabetes fast plasma glucose â‰¥ 126 mg/dL
